summary: "My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy" is Kanye West's fifth album, released in 2010. After a controversial incident, he recorded it in Hawaii with many famous producers and artists. The album has a rich, complex sound mixing soul, pop, and rock influences. It explores themes like fame and the American Dream. With hits like "Power" and "Runaway," it debuted at number one in the US and Canada. It won a Grammy for Best Rap Album and is considered one of the best albums of the 2010s and all time by many critics.
title: My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy
